title: Metro rail services to remain briefly halted today
body: Metro rail services in Dhaka city will remain suspended for 40 minutes today, Tuesday, to ensure safety during a parachute jump as part of Victory Day celebration. Metro rail system’s implementing agency Dhaka Mass Transit Company Limited in a press release on Monday also stated that the services would remain closed from 11:50am till 12:30pm on the entire route to ensure safety of the paratroopers. The services of the country’s first 20.1-kilometre metro rail system were inaugurated on December 28, 2022, on the Uttara-Agargaon section. Currently, work is going on to extend the route up to Kamalapur.
